availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Assistant Adjutant General Letter Book - No. 1 ; 5 Sept 1863 - 2 Feb 1864

body.p:
Head Quarters Kentucky Vols
Frankfort, Ky.
Adjt
Janry 7, 1863

Capt. E. B. Treadway having reported himself at these Head Qr without his detail of enlsited on will remain subject to the order this Deptmt and will report by letter at least once a week un his detail arrives.

By order of the Governor
John Boyle
Adjt Genl of Ky
